General.Name: GoldOn Resources Ltd
General.Description: GoldON Resources Ltd., an exploration stage company, explores for mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. The company was formerly known as Newcastle Minerals Ltd. and changed its name to GoldON Resources Ltd. in March 2013. GoldON Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Victoria, Canada.
General.Address: 179-2945 Jacklin Road, Victoria, BC, Canada, V9B 6J9
